title: Brexit: A Nightmare at Halloween? (with Barry Andrews MEP)
itunes:title: Brexit: A Nightmare at Halloween? (with Barry Andrews MEP)
description:
As Boris Johnson meets with EU leaders to rejuvenate talks over a free-trade deal, Irish MEP Barry Andrews tells Bloomberg Westminster's Sebastian Salek and Roger Hearing why we're heading for a nightmare Halloween.

Plus non-essential shops have reopened in England. But is the government moving too quickly? John Penrose, Conservative MP for Weston-super-Mare, joins to discuss. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
